title: Tour de France 2013 - The Game v1.0.9
description:
THE OFFICIAL TOUR DE FRANCE 2013 MOBILE GAME ! Enjoy the thrill of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most popular cycling race and face the stars of the peloton ! Including all official stages and teams of the Tour! Your mission : leading your team to Victory and winning the YELLOW JERSEY at the end of the Tour on the mythic stage of the Champs-ElysÃƒÂ©es in Paris !

As a Team Director, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have one and only mission : leading your team to victory at the end of the 21 stages of the Tour de France 2013 between Bastia in Corsica, and the Champs-ElysÃƒÂ©es in Paris !

Take control of a team of cycling competitors and choose the best strategy, the best tactical schemes and go win the Yellow jersey! Elaborate your strategy, launch attacks, manage the climbs and the breakaways of your team, and score points to win the Green and Polka dot jerseys, in the real conditions of the Tour, as if you were truly part of it !

- The official stages, racers and teams of the Tour 2013 ! 
- Dozens of challenges to take up ! 
- The real conditions of the Tour : clims, breakaways, distances, weather, etc. 
- Dynamic gameplay during sprints ! 
- The exact profiles and stats of the cycling competitors: physical shape, performances, specialty (leader, climber, etc.) 
- More leaderboards for more challenge : Yellow jersey, Green jersey, Polka dot Jersey, stage rankings, general rankings, etc. 
- Share your success on the Tour with your friends !

What's in this version:

* AI improved: opponents behaviour is now more accurate according to team specialities
* Team stats balanced: you now have a chance to shine even with the weaker teams
* Final team and team rider names integrated
* Energy management improved: solved the problem with too few energy available on stage 10 and above
* Many bug fixes, performance and stability improvements
